description: This small yet smart restaurant in the Oltrepò Pavese region is a dream come true for owner-chef Alessandro Folli, whose cuisine shows the influence of his experience working in different restaurants around Europe. Ad Astra delights guests with dishes which demonstrate a perfect balance between modern and classic culinary styles. Bravo!
